Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 37 points, a season-high, to help lead the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 144-126 win over the Chicago Bulls.
Darius Garland scored 29 points and had 9 assists.
Jarrett Allen had a double-double with 24 points and 10 rebounds.
Caris LeVert scored 22 points off the bench.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Cleveland.
Others: The Cavaliers extended their undefeated streak to 14 games.
